meanings.definition: Existing or occurring above the threshold of consciousness.
meanings.sent1: The supraliminal message was easily noticed by everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: The teacher used supraliminal cues to help the students remember important information.
meanings.sent3: The supraliminal hint in the movie made the audience chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a supraliminal beacon of happiness in the room.
meanings.sent5: The supraliminal sound of the ticking clock filled the silent room.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to stimuli that are above the threshold of perception.
meanings.sent1: The supraliminal images on the screen were clear and easily seen.
meanings.sent2: The supraliminal colors in the painting caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The supraliminal taste of the dish surprised the guests.
meanings.sent4: His words had a supraliminal impact on her decision.
meanings.sent5: The supraliminal scent of fresh flowers filled the room with a pleasant aroma.

meanings.definition: Beyond the level of conscious awareness.
meanings.sent1: The supraliminal thoughts lingered in her mind without her realizing.
meanings.sent2: The supraliminal influence of the advertisement affected consumer behavior.
meanings.sent3: The supraliminal presence of the hidden camera made the situation comical.
meanings.sent4: His actions had a supraliminal effect on the outcome of the experiment.
meanings.sent5: The supraliminal feeling of unease crept into her subconscious slowly.
